Class AbstractTestClass

  • java.lang.Object
    • tests.AbstractTestClass
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TestCoursework.AbstractTestCellist, TestCoursework.AbstractTestComposition, TestCoursework.AbstractTestConductor, TestCoursework.AbstractTestMusician, TestCoursework.AbstractTestMusicScore, TestCoursework.AbstractTestOrchestra, TestCoursework.AbstractTestPerson, TestCoursework.AbstractTestPianist, TestCoursework.AbstractTestViolinist

    public abstract class AbstractTestClass
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for testing signature of the a class.

        message - the message for testing.
        parameterTypes - the parameter types
        Returns:
        the constructor that match the input signature.

      • assertMethod

        public java.lang.reflect.Method assertMethod(java.lang.String message,
                                             java.lang.String name,
                                             java.lang.Class<?>... parameterTypes)
        Assert and return a method with a given signature for the class under test. The method chosen will be the most specific one that matches the required signature in the class hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        message - the message for testing.
        name - the name of the method.
        parameterTypes - the parameter types.
        Returns:
        the method matching the input signature.
        See Also:
        assertMethod(Class, String, String, Class[])
